translations: 重复，重说，重做； 重做的事，重说的话；重复的事物，复制品；（乐）（章节或音节的）反复；<古>教师指定的背诵材料

phrs.headword: repetition measure we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao

sentences.sentence: It is real prayer, and not mechanical repetition.
sentences.translation: 这是真正的祈祷，而不是机械式的重复。

sentences.sentence: He could also have cut out much of the repetition and thus saved many pages.
sentences.translation: 他本来也可以删掉很多重复的语句，省去很多页数。
重复有助于提高我们的记忆力。
